definitions.definition: A thick soup or stew , made by boiling vegetables, grains, and sometimes meat or fish, a staple food throughout Europe in the Middle Ages .
A dish made by stewing plantain , beans , or yam in a tomato- and pepper-based sauce.

main_definition: ( archaic or historical ) A thick soup or stew , made by boiling vegetables, grains, and sometimes meat or fish, a staple food throughout Europe in the Middle Ages .
secondary_definitions: ( Nigeria ) A dish made by stewing plantain , beans , or yam in a tomato- and pepper-based sauce.
